text: long _max ( long , long ) ; int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , i , j ; long max = 0 ; long a [ 101 ] [ 101 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; if ( n == 1 ) { printf ( "%ld\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; continue ; } for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( j + 1 < i ) a [ i ] [ j ] += _max ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] , a [ i - 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; else { if ( i == j ) a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; else a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) max = a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] > max ? a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] : max ; printf ( "%ld\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; } long _max ( long a , long b ) { return a > b ? a : b ; }
